title: Beautiful script(?) font
content:
> **![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724132043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lies_3824.png)**
> 
> Can anyone identify this font? I love it so much, but I can't find the font name or even something close to it.
> 
> Help!
author: authorninja

comments.content: There are plenty of fonts that look similar to that. [Linotype Zapfino Three](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724132043/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/zapfino/linotypezapfino-three/), for instance., which isn't quite the same. There is a possibility that the sample you have provided isn't a font at all and was painted on by hand.
Thanks! I'm pretty sure it wasn't painted on, because this was an ameture graphic. That font is awesome, thanks!

**[Before the Rain (Th)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724132043/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Before%20the%20Rain%20-%20Th&fid=7c99dfc9937e74d847d61324846b8ce5&fsize=60&text=lies&wrap=2)** by Måns Grebäck [2011, Free for personal use]
OMG THANKS SO MUCH! You found it! It's beautiful, thank you!
